tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE government_agencies (
    agency_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    agency_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    public_records TEXT,
    transparency_compliance BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE public_records (
    record_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    agency_name VARCHAR(50),
    record_type VARCHAR(50),
    record_date DATE,
    record_content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_logs (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    agency_name VARCHAR(50),
    action_taken VARCHAR(100),
    action_date TIMESTAMP,
    user_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE public_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  record_type VARCHAR(50),
  record_description TEXT,
  record_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE government_agencies (
  agency_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  agency_name VARCHAR(100),
  agency_location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE transparency_laws (
  law_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  law_name VARCHAR(50),
  law_description TEXT,
  law_category VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE compliance_checks (
  check_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  check_result BOOLEAN,
  check_date DATE,
  check_notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE officials (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   name VARCHAR(255),
   position VARCHAR(255),
   agency_id INT,
   FOREIGN KEY (agency_id) REFERENCES agencies (id)
);

CREATE TABLE public_records (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   record_type VARCHAR(255),
   description TEXT,
   approval_date DATE,
   agency_id INT,
   FOREIGN KEY (agency_id) REFERENCES agencies (id)
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_logs (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   action_type VARCHAR(255),
   action_date TIMESTAMP,
   official_id INT,
   FOREIGN KEY (official_id) REFERENCES officials (id)
);
